remarks: Function-builder for derivative: restrict a derivative to an open subset.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvmptadd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptadd.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptadd.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptadd.da $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptres.y $e |- ( ph -> Y C_ X ) $.
dvmptres.j $e |- J = ( K |`t S ) $.
dvmptres.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
dvmptres.t $e |- ( ph -> Y e. J ) $.
dvmptres $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. Y |-> A ) ) = ( x e. Y |-> B ) ) $.
$d S x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
